plot: Melinda and Eli help Ned stop a ghost that's out for revenge when the Grandview radio station broadcasts the humiliating secrets that led to its death.

Ned and friends broadcast a prank scene on their college radio program that turns out to be a transcript from the past, supplied by a ghost, over what led to its death. With Ned now included among its humiliating-to-dangerous retributions, Melinda, Eli and Delia step in to learn the ghost's identity and of those who were involved in the circumstances that led to its untimely demise.—statmanjeff
